oai_dc:dc.dc:title: What's Going on in Bovine Viral Vaccines: Do Both Killed and Modified Live Vaccines Induce Cell Mediated Immunity?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Chase, Christopher C. L.
Hurley, David J.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine viral vaccines
cell mediated
T cell response
IBR
BRSV
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The spectrum of immunity from inactivated bovine viral vaccines has often been discounted because of the lack of a cell mediated response. With the advent of newer adjuvants, the effect of an inactivated BRSV, BVDV PI3, IBR vaccine (Vira Shieldâ„¢ 5: Grand Laboratories, Freeman, SD) on cell mediated and cytotoxic T cell response against IBR and BRSV was measured.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1995; 231
